abstract: The owners of Somerfield Stores, a British grocery chain, have put the company up for sale and brought in Citigroup to conduct an auction, The Deal reported.
lead_paragraph: The owners of Somerfield Stores, a British grocery chain, have put the company up for sale and brought in Citigroup to conduct an auction, The Deal reported.

headline.main: Private Equity-Owned Somerfield Said to Be for Sale
